content.text: 2 1/2 cups apples - peeled, cored and diced
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "2 1/2 cups apples - peeled, cored and diced" )
( ing-12 "1 (16 ounce) container cream cheese frosting" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).
2) Beat together the oil, eggs, vanilla and sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Beat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the oil"@17:24 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "eggs"@26:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@32:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@44:49 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Sift together the flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon and nutmeg.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Sift"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the flour"@17:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "baking soda"@28:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@41:45 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "cinnamon"@47:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "nutmeg"@60:66 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Add to egg mixture; stir in apples, nuts and raisins.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "egg mixture"@10:21 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "stir in"@23:30 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "apples"@31:37 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "nuts"@39:43 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "raisins"@48:55 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Pour into prepared pan and bake at 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) for 1 1/2 hrs or until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "prepared pan"@13:25 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "bake"@30:34 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "325 degrees F"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "1 1/2 hrs"@72:81 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean"@85:143 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "165 degrees C"@53:66 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cool and frost with cream cheese icing.
7) Sprinkle top with 1/4 cup fine chopped nuts.
